participant_1.background:
I sometimes put off work to spend more time with my dog.
i am a grown woman.
I don't always have time to keep up with my family because I live in the city and work long hours.
i am allergic to nuts.
i try to eat healthy or i do not eat at all.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my daughter.
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest.
I am trying to keep myself fit and healthy.
My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.

content.text: Hi!  How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I am doing okay, thank you for asking. Are you excited for your wedding?
Yes, I am very excited! We have been planning it for months and it is finally here.
That's great! What are you doing to celebrate?
We are having a small ceremony in the park with our family and friends. Then, we are going to have a reception at a local restaurant.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am sure it will be a beautiful day.
Thank you, I hope so too!
What do you do for work?
Oh, that sounds like an interesting job. I work in marketing.
That's cool! I have always been interested in marketing. Do you like your job?
I do, it is a lot of fun. I get to work with a lot of different people and learn about new things all the time.
That sounds great! I am glad you enjoy your job.
Thank you! I am excited to hear more about your wedding.
Sure, I would love to tell you more about it.
